CustomField.description: If selected, timecard approval requests are grouped into default primary or secondary categories. This setting populates automatically based on the user’s selections on the Manage Timecards to Approve page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, timecard approval requests are grouped into default primary or secondary categories. This setting populates automatically based on the user’s selections on the Manage Timecards to Approve page.
CustomField.label: Always Group Timecard Approvals
